name: Samurai Rising Free
description:
Are you ready to unleash your inner samurai warrior?

Samurai Rising is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. There are many enemies out on the street tonight and you must fight them all!

How far can you go? How many coins can you collect along the way? Collect those power-ups to help you out even more!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock other cool samurai warriors for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect coins to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Samurai Rising right now while it's 100% FREE!
